service_alerts.subject: Bangalore, Delhi NCR, Mumbai Network Outage

entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Bangalore, Delhi NCR, Mumbai location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
